website_summaries.verdict: This collection of figures look like they just walked off the Detective Pikachu film set, and it’s a great value for the price.
pros: Includes Bulbasaur, Ludicolo, Mewtwo, Psyduck, and 2 Detective Pikachu toys
Mewtwo and Ludicolo have posable arms
cons: A different 6th Pokémon would have been cooler than a pair of Detective Pikachu

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive for a used toy
customer_reviews.text: Seems used. The box was tattered, ripped and well-worn. The toys aren't really even in the plastic holders. This was expensive for something that was advertised as a new toy but appears to be used/secondhand. I don't have a problem with used stuff but this is a gift for someone else I paid full-price for a new item.
customer_reviews.author: erika

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is but what it is is expensive for the little guys. Cute package. The just don't look like much for the pricse
customer_reviews.author: Irish3

customer_reviews.title: Great Pokemon set
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grand daughters after we watched the movie. They really liked them and play with them alot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Runyan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and accurate movie figures! They made an excellent birthday present for my nephews.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: My Pokemon Fan loved these
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandson who loves Pokemon - was exactly as pictured and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: briley

customer_reviews.title: Quality toys.
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys them and they seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good toy buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift for my son. Good size and it got here super fast. Satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: very durable
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my grandsons cake, so cute, his mom used them for his other party's cake as well, washed up and cleaned up nice
customer_reviews.author: Molly Weisenbeck

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: After saw Detective Pikachu, my son asks us to buy him a mewtwo. This set includes a mewtwo and basically fill his need.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoxi Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great toys
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Pokémon toys! You can see this toys in our YouTube channel: ALONSO CRAZY CARS
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Cute collectible
customer_reviews.text: Got these for incentives to read. They are cute collectibles and the kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Macklin

customer_reviews.title: Fast arrival
customer_reviews.text: Received faster and stated which was great. You was as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Waterman

customer_reviews.title: Not great but not bad...
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap, poor quality as far as the paint/print. Flaked off easily but my son still lives to play with them!
customer_reviews.author: kwack

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old nephew and my 6 year old son both love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them. Fair price. Wish they had more multi packs like this.
customer_reviews.author: PRIME

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6yr old grandson who loves Pokémon he is very happy
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: Neato toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece and nephew. They both adored them. Ludicolo is a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Bubb

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for Christmas and he was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Andre

customer_reviews.title: Nice toys but fairly fragile
customer_reviews.text: These toys are nice looking but fairly fragile. The tails were so thin that two of them broke off already.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My grand son and I play with them each time I am at his house. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pika pika Cuteness!!!
customer_reviews.text: Any fan of Pokemon or especially the new Pikacha Detective film...needs these! You get 6 vinyl toy collectibles from the Pikachu Detective Movie. 2 of the figures are of Detective Pikachu. They are presented in a cool and colorful box. Each is only about an inch, plus or minus. My teen girls are Pokemon fans and loved this as a gift! They each grabbed a Pikachu and divided the rest equally. The price is average but worth purchasing via Amazon due to convince. I wasn't even aware these figures existed until I browsed! These are so fun and detailed perfectly! Fantastic gift idea! *Hope my review helps and I'm basing it solely on the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Six piece Pokémon Detective Pikachu figure set
customer_reviews.text: Pokémon Detective Pikachu Battle Figure 6pc Multi-pack The NEW Pokémon Detective Pikachu multipack features sis figures: * two 2′′ Pikachu * 2′′ Bulbasaur * 2′′ Psyduck * 3′′ Ludicolo * 3′′ Mewtwo Each figure is in the Detective Pikachu movie and are official licensed Pokémon products from Wicked Cool Toys! Mt grandkids are big fans and play with these toys daily. They especially like playing with them in the bathtub. Super cool toys that will make all Pokémon fans happy!
customer_reviews.author: 🌼 Daba 🌼

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for Pokemon fans!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 year old granddaughter is a huge Pokemon fan. She reads the books, knows all the characters, and has enjoyed the movie very much. She was very excited to get this figurines. She has others so she said now she can make up all kinds of games with them and scenarios and teach her younger cousins too. Her parents says the figures are greats as they wash off easily and are very sturdy -- more rubber than plastic which can be brittle. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Detective Pikachu fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect gift for any Pokemon or Detective Pikachu fan. My son was thrilled with the accuracy and quality of the pieces. The plastic is slightly soft and the details are really excellent. All the pieces balance well. The Pikachu's have small feet so do tend to be knocked off balance easily but he doesn't mind one bit. He now plans to get the kit with Cosmog in it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Iris74

customer_reviews.title: Adorbs
customer_reviews.text: This grandma is still playing Pokémon Go. I don't know why, but I love to catch those little guys and I like going around and picking up useful items at Poke stops. I find that these Pokes are representative of the Pokes in the games. My grandson plays Pokémon on his Nintendo 3ds too. So, we are Poke fans in this family. He is going to want my Pokes.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Pika!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty cute figures. I'm a Pokemon Go! player and a toy collector, so these were impossible to resist. I was most excited about Ludicolo, but he's a little creepy looking. The rest of the figures are good representations of the digital figures. A must have for Pokemon fans, even if they haven't seen the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Del Sesto

customer_reviews.title: love this set. LOVE THIS SET.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nicely designed and the painting is on point. They're the cutest things ever and adapt to a TON of other brands and play structures with the help of your imagination!!! My son loves his. He's about to be five. These ride on his fortnite bus. Awesome characters fr!
customer_reviews.author: MELLY Z

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: We just saw the Detective Pikachu movie and my grand son was delighted to get this gift set. He is now making up his own detective stories using these characters from the movie! They are well made and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great pack!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old is a huge Pokémon fan and he was loved this pack! They are the same size as the other Pokémon he collects. Good quality and durable so I don’t have to worry about the paint chipping or a tail falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

product_meta.title: Pokémon Detective Pikachu Battle Figure 6pc Multi-pack - Comes with Two 2" Pikachu, 2" Psyduck, 2" Bulbasaur, 3" Mewtwo & 3" Ludicolo
product_meta.description: Take your Pokémon universe to a whole new level of awesomeness and excitement with the NEW Pokémon Detective Pikachu the movie figure line! Explore Ryme City with your 2” in scale figures Detective Pikachu, Psyduck and Bulbasaur. Create dynamic poses with your 3” articulated figures Ludicolo, Mr. Mime and more and take them on an adventure you’ll never forget. Each figure is highly detailed and replicates the authentic look of Detective Pikachu the movie! Available in 2” Partner Packs (comes with 2 figures), 3” single packs and 6 Pack (comes with an exclusive 3” figure)!
feature_bullets: Contains 4 two inch figures and 2 three inch figures: 2" Detective Pikachus (2), 2" Psyduck, 2" Bulbasaur, 3" Mewtwo, and 3" Ludicolo
Each figure is in the Detective Pikachu movie!
Three inch Pokémon Figures have Articulation
Two inch figures are highly detailed
Official licensed Pokémon product from Wicked Cool Toys!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars379 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
